typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 4)) ~> moviesCSV
source(output(
		userId as short,
		movieId as integer,
		rating as double,
		timestamp as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 20,
		movieId
	)) ~> ratingCSV
moviesCSV select(mapColumn(
		movieId,
		title,
		genres
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ratingCSV select(mapColumn(
		userId,
		movieId,
		rating,
		timestamp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	container: 'analytics',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MovieToParquet
Select2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	container: 'analytics',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RatingToParquet
